Newbie Guide:
Without a class change, there is nothing more that you can be taught beyond a certain point. Once you reach level 20, you can change your class.
If I advise you in advance, you can also learn the special skills only available to our race. If you prefer to use a thin blade, you can acquire skills like Rapier Mastery, which increases your attack power; Penetrate Shot, which damages an opponent by adding soul power to a bow attack; or Fire Trap, which explodes when an enemy comes near.
Interested? Then continue your training and prepare to transfer your occupation and you will get what you want.
